content.query:
-- PARA USERS INTERNOS -<
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources 
WHERE name = 'treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO


--PARA USER EXTERNOS ->
--Entrar no datalake e gerar chave SAS
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources 
WHERE name = 'treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net_ext') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net_ext] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net',
		CREDENTIAL=[SASADLSTRNSOLAR]
	)
GO
